description:
The KÜHL Shift™ Amfib Short with DWR finish for fast dry time easily transitions from town to travel, beach to bar.

The waistband is lined with soft micro-chamois for unmatched comfort, and the gusseted crotch allows greater freedom of movement.

The Shift Amfib Short features chino-style, flat front pockets and KÜHL's signature stealth cell phone pocket. Patent pending Equalizr™ rear pockets create a perfectly level, clean, and incognito style in a groundbreaking design for the outdoor pant industry.
name: Kuhl Shift Amphibia Shorts, 12" Inseam - Mens

specs.value: two front hand, one coin, two back and one stealth cell phone
